page.title: 04EDUCATION
page.content: {Primary}education for this Parish is at Ropsley Church of England school, children being taken there by taxi. The{Secondary}school provision is either in Grantham at the Kings school or Kesteven Girls Grammar school; or at Charles Reed school in Corby Glenn. However of the 10 children of school age in these villages 4 attend Ropsley school, 3 attend Kirstone House school Baston and 3 attend Witham Hall school. The latter being privately run.{Adult education:}There are a variety of daytime and evening courses at Grantham College of Further Education. Evening classes mainly non-vocational, are also held at Ropsley school, organised by Stamford College of Further Education.
